file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE2【チラ見せ】 [4C3kreEOk1Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A collage of fan messages and illustrations for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony'.
Key visual for 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony' hololive STAGE2.
Narration introducing hololive merchandise from Bandai and Bandai Spirits at hololive EXPO 2025.

subtitles.original:
hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony
hololive STAGE2
subtitles.english:
hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony
hololive STAGE2

subtitles.original: バンダイ・バンダイスピリッツより、
ホロライブEXPO 2025の会場にある特設ブースで、
subtitles.english: at the special booth in the hololive EXPO 2025 venue,

subtitles.original: 展示中の商品をご紹介！
subtitles.english: we're introducing the products on display!

subtitles.original: 一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中。
subtitles.english: the Ichiban Kuji special photo booth is also open.

subtitles.original: モニターをタッチしてくじ券をめくり、
subtitles.english: Touch the monitor to flip the lottery ticket,

subtitles.original: 出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english: and you can take a photo with the design that appears.
